price: A rãnar nan sunã biyar mai kira, bãbu karkata a gare shi, kuma sautuka suka yi kawaici ga Mai rahama, bã ka sauraren kõme fãce sautin tafiya.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلدَّاعِيَ لَا عِوَجَ لَهُۥۖ وَخَشَعَتِ ٱلۡأَصۡوَاتُ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ فَلَا تَسۡمَعُ إِلَّا هَمۡسٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yattabiʿūna al-dāʿiya lā ʿiwaja lahu wakhashaʿati al-aṣwātu lilrraḥmāni falā tasmaʿu illā hamsan
